mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_NO, S.STUDY_NAME, S.STUDY_DEL_FL, S.STUDY_MAX_COUNT, S.STUDY_DATE, S.STUDY_TYPE, S.STUDY_PERIOD, S.STUDY_MAIN_IMG, R.RULE_CONTENT, M.STUDY_CAP FROM STUDY S JOIN STUDY_RULE R ON S.STUDY_NO = R.STUDY_NO JOIN STUDY_MEMBER M ON S.STUDY_NO = M.STUDY_NO WHERE S.STUDY_NO = #{studyNo} AND M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
